## Installing Bioconductor 3.21 for R version 4.5.1

```{r Installing Bioconductor 3.21 for R version 4.5.1}

if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) 
  
  install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install(version = "3.21")

```

## Installing Limma Package

```{r Installing Limma Package}
BiocManager::install("limma")

```

## Checking version of Bioconductor available on R Studio

```{r Checking version of Bioconductor available on R Studio}

BiocManager::version()

```

## Checking whether Bioconductor installation is updated 

(and the installed packages are from the same version of Bioconductor)

```{r Checking whether Bioconductor installation is updated}

BiocManager::valid()

```
